newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan offers lube base oils for sale, export.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan offers lube base oils for sale, export.

text.p: Pakistan's state-run National Refinery Ltd said on Friday it had invited bids by March 20 for the sale and export of 9,000 tonnes of lube base oils available for shipment in May/June in one or two cargo lots.
The bids in the U.S. dollars per tonne FOB Karachi should reach the refinery separately for 6,000 tonnes of 400 NHVI and 3,000 tonnes of 150 NHVI lube base oils, the refinery said.
